text:
Qubit | London, UK | Onsite

We are also looking for a Junior Javascript Engineer. Perfect role for a recent graduate looking for their first front end role with great career progression and training on offer. Will need demonstrable experience of front end technologies. Unfortunately we cannot provide visas for this role
